features.name: Startblock Onboarding
userFlows: User can navigate through codebase files using voice commands
User can receive personalized greetings and guidance during onboarding
User can ask questions and get responses about the codebase

  startblock_onboarding_2 --> startblock_onboarding_3

features.name: Livekit Integration
userFlows: User can generate a LiveKit token for real-time communication
User can create or join a LiveKit room for onboarding sessions
User can generate a LiveKit token for video sessions
User can join a video room based on session ID
features.mermaidDiagram:
flowchart TD
  Start([Livekit Integration])
  livekit_integration_1[User can generate a LiveKit token for video ses...]
  livekit_integration_2[User can join a video room based on session ID]
  Start --> livekit_integration_1
  livekit_integration_1 --> livekit_integration_2
  livekit_integration_2 --> End([Complete])

features.name: Onboarding Agent
userFlows: User can navigate through the codebase using voice commands
User can ask questions about the codebase and receive explanations
User can receive personalized onboarding guidance based on their session data
